certificationsSupport: 1.英國皇家物流與運輸協會(CILT)國際證照
2.美國國際物流協會（SOLE）國際證照
description: This subject will introduce the theory of physical distribution and some experiences of distribution companies. I will keep students to understand freight distribution, location theory, transportation management, …et al.

syllabus.zh:
1.實體配送概論
2.實體配送與顧客服務
3.運輸管理
4.區位理論與選擇
5.運輸網路設計
6.輸配送系統分析
7.實體配送個案討論
syllabus.en:
1. Introduction to physical distribution
2. Physical Distribution and customer service
3. Transportation management
4. Location theory and selection
5. Transportation network design
6. The analysis for distribution system
7. The case study for physical distribution

weeklySchedule:
week 1 syllabus description, introduction to logistics
week 2 procurement/purchasing management
week 3 warehouse operation management
week 4 operational facility safety and operation management assessment 1
week 5 operational facility safety and operation management assessment 2
week 6 Midterm paper
week 7 inventory management
week 8 transportation and distribution management
week 9 customs clearance of goods and forwarder
week 10 logistics information systems
week 11 logistics enterprise ethics and communication
week 12 Term paper (all involved)

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 能瞭解物流管理與實體配送之基本知識
能應用實體配送之專業知識解決問題
能分析評估問題之多面向，近而發現問題，並能解決問題之方式
能將理論知識轉換為實務技術，並能擁有取得物流證照之能力
能體認工作態度與團隊合作在職場之重要性，並能接受分工活作之工作方式
